attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the great british public, feel that this government is no longer leading the country and no longer acts in the country's best interests and as such, a general election must be called now. We the undersigned demand a choice in electing our prime minister and that this prime minister, who is unelected by the public, has no mandate to govern. We demand a general election now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
